task.title: Switching to the Stock DHCP Package

taskbody.context:
This procedure is optional but Eucalyptus 4.0 uses the stock DHCP server package. Prior to starting Eucalyptus services after upgrading packages, edit the configurations on each Cluster Controller (CC) and Node Controller (NC).
To edit the values in the CCs and NCs:

step.cmd: Go to /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf and change the value of VNET_DHCPDAEMON from /usr/sbin/dhcpd41 to /usr/sbin/dhcpd.

After you have started all Eucalyptus services as described in the proceeding section, ensure that DHCP is functioning correctly. Make sure that instances are being assigned addresses from the DHCP server.

info.note: Not applying this change does not cause the cloud to malfunction. However, the existing VNET_DHCPDAEMON package will no longer be maintained, as newly installed machines will already have the stock package applied.
